laboratory_examinations.findings: Erythrocyte sedimentation rate was 68 mm/h on admission, decreased to 28% after anakinra treatment.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial ESR was 68 mm/h; later decreased significantly after starting anakinra.

laboratory_examinations.findings: C-reactive protein level was 73 mg/L on admission, decreased by 86% with anakinra treatment.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial CRP was 73 mg/L; decreased significantly after beginning treatment with anakinra.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Total cholesterol level was 7.95 mmol/L (307 mg/dL); after 6 months of simvastatin, it was 3.94 mmol/L (152 mg/dL).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Total cholesterol decreased from 7.95 mmol/L to 3.94 mmol/L after treatment with simvastatin.
